station.name: Scout Radio
station.longDesc: Scout Radio is a National Scout Active Support Unit of The Scout Association with the aim of supporting broadcast radio within scouting.

station.name: JOTA / JOTI Radio
station.longDesc: JOTI Radio is the official JOTA-JOTI radio station with trusted partner status. We provide non-stop, live broadcasts throughout the event from our UK studios and are powered by the wonderful team at Avon Scout Radio.
